org.tensorflow.lite.examples.detection.fragment

Class ChatFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      • org.tensorflow.lite.examples.detection.fragment.ChatFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner

    public class ChatFragment
extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
    A fragment that display a list of user, whom the current user has received or sent message from to, that is fetched from Firebase Database
